summary: Collaborating with the frontend team to build responsive, user-friendly web interfaces using React and Tailwind. Developing modular, reusable components while maintaining a clean, scalable codebase aligned with best practices.
Built responsive, accessible React/Next.js interfaces with TypeScript, styling via MUI and Tailwind; integrated REST endpoints; and shipped reliably using GitLab CI/CD to AWS
Developing production‑grade Next.js front‑ends: TypeScript, MUI/Tailwind design systems, REST/GraphQL integrations, and containerized deployments orchestrated via GitLab to AWS.
